bio: Workshops, video and blog tutorials for web3 devs in Spanish, English and French
impactDescription:
1. Simplified the process of running an OP Chain
2. Made content about the Op Stack in Spanish (there is not much documentation in spanish atm)
3. Helped users interacting with ethereum contracts on OP for the first time
4. Helped artists launching their own NFT projects on OP Mainnet
5. Provided support for devs launching on OP Mainnet
contributionDescription:
I believe in the rollup centric future for Ethereum. That's why I study and create content about L2s. I think Optimism is very aligned with Ethereum decentralization values so I find a lot value and potential on the Optimism tech and culture. That's why I made the following contributions to the Optimism Collective:

1. OP Stack documentation guides
2. OP Stack developer content in livestream, article and video format
3. Developer, artist and user onboarding to OP Mainnet
4. Smart contract development on OP Mainnet for in-person events in local community, at San Pedro Sula, Honduras

* Note: My contributions listed here are RPGF3 only. I'm a RPFG2 recipient, you can refer to my previous contributions here:
https://gov.optimism.io/t/education-nominations-for-rpgf2/4640/81
